# Contributing

## Setup
```
$ npm install -g yarn typescript tslint
```

## After Merging from Origin
```
$ npm install
```

## Build and Run Tests
```
export MQ_IO_APPLICATION_SECRET="{secret}"
$ npm run build
```

### Run All Tests
`npm run test`

### Run Unit Tests
`npm run test-unit`

### Run Integration Tests
`npm run test-int`
